attributes.action: deny the Speaker, Mr Michael Martin from being rewarded for his incompetancy through the award of a peerage and grossly inflated pension rights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Michael Martin has consistently tried to ensure that transparency of MPs expenses be protected from public scrutiny. He has compounded his incompetance by trying to shift the blame onto the whistle-blowers instead of those who abused the system. Rules that apply to the public must apply to all MPs. No-one is above the law. He must under no circumstances be seen to be profiting from his actions.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
